channel.title: General Hiromi Lazy Chilling Rain on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Hiromi Lazy Chilling Rain on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: today has been a lazy and rainy day.
item.description: Today we just hung around. We are going later to walk around where one of the BAPE stores are and just hang out. then to this awesome italian place in ginza.Â I am happy we didn’t really do anything crazy today. Its nice to have a normal existance with hiromi again. No running around. No going to crazy things. No government offices. Just hanging out. To the future! Check out hiromi’s blog: hirominakazawa.
